title: Tactical Shotgun
info: The Tactical Shotgun is a Hardmode, post-Plantera ranged weapon. It is an upgraded version of the Shotgun, auto-firing six spread shots per bullet consumed (against the Shotgun's average of four), for a possible combined base damage of 174 per bullet spent (not including bullet damage stats which are then added). It has a 8.33% / 15.97% (1/12 / 23/144) chance to drop from Tactical Skeletons in the post-Plantera Dungeon.
